title: Cloud Migration & DevOps
shortDescription: Modernize legacy infrastructure with Kubernetes, CI/CD automation, and hybrid cloud architectures.
longDescription: We help enterprises move from monolithic, on-premise systems to scalable, cloud-native architectures. Our approach minimizes downtime and focuses on observability, security, and cost-optimization from Day 1.
benefits: Reduce operational costs by up to 40%
Deploy code 10x faster with automated CI/CD

title: Edge AI & Computer Vision
shortDescription: Deploy real-time inference models on rugged edge devices for manufacturing and smart cities.

title: Cybersecurity & Compliance
shortDescription: End-to-end VAPT, SOC monitoring, and compliance advisory for HIPAA/GDPR/SOC2.

title: Industrial IoT Solutions
shortDescription: Connect assets, collect telemetry, and visualize operations with our secure IoT stack.

title: Embedded Firmware Engineering
shortDescription: Custom RTOS and bare-metal firmware development for mission-critical hardware.
